feed.title: GitHub PowerShell Daily Trending
feed.subtitle: Daily Trending of PowerShell in GitHub

entry.title: olafhartong/MDE-AuditCheck
entry.summary:
MDE relies on some of the Audit settings to be enabled

MDE-AuditCheck

Makes sure all audit settings MDE relies on are properly set in the GPO

The script relies on the Remote Server Administration Tools (RSAT).
